Administration.text:
Type:
Antiparasitic
, anthelmintic
Dosage Forms: 600
Routes of Administration: Oral
Common Trade Names: Biltricide

Adult_Dosing.text:
Schistosomiasis: 20mg/kg PO tid x1 day
Separate doses by 4-6h
Give with food
Do not crush/chew
Liver flukes: 25mg/kg PO tid x1 day
Separate doses by 4-6h
Cysticercosis: 50mg/kg/day PO divided q8h x14 days
Off label use
Tapeworms: 5-25mg/kg PO x1
Off label use

Only_for_children>_4_y/o.text:
Schistosomiasis: 20mg/kg PO bid-tid x1 day
Liver flukes: 25mg/kg PO tid x1-2 days
Cysticercosis: 50mg/kg/day PO divided q8h x14 days
Off label use
Tape worms: 5-25mg/kg PO x1
Off label use

Schistosomiasis: 20mg/kg PO bid-tid x1 day
Liver flukes: 25mg/kg PO tid x1-2 days
Cysticercosis: 50mg/kg/day PO divided q8h x14 days
Off label use
Tape worms: 5-25mg/kg PO x1
Off label use

Hepatic_Dosing.text: Caution advised with Child-Pugh Class B or C
Caution advised with Child-Pugh Class B or C
Caution advised with Child-Pugh Class B or C

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
ocular schistosomiasis
ocular cysticercosis
CNS lesions
seizure history

Serious.text:
Generalized hypersensitivity reaction
polyserositis
arrhythmias
bradycardia
ventricular fibrillation
AV block
diarrhea, bloody
seizures
Jarisch-Herxheimer reaction

Common.text:
malaise
headache
dizziness
abdominal pain/nausea and vomiting
